blogPost.excerpt: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. ⠀ Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
blogPost.body: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. ⠀ Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
blogPost.title: Hugo - Better meetings through centralized, actionable notes
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 雨果提高了团队的会议效率。它与您的工作日历相连接，提供一个协作准备、记录、分配任务和分享见解的地方。⠀ 通过连接到您的团队和他们的工具的笔记，掌握远程会议的情况。
localize.tagline: 通过集中的、可操作的说明改进会议

localize.description: 雨果提高了團隊的會議效率。它與您的工作日曆相連接，提供一個協作準備、記錄、分配任務和分享見解的地方。⠀ 通過連接到您的團隊和他們的工具的筆記，掌握遠程會議的情況。
localize.tagline: 通過集中的、可操作的說明改進會議

previous.excerpt: No need to hire AI developers or specialists to introduce new technology and diversify your business. CLICK AI allows anyone to create deep learning-based AI models fast, with high accuracy, and without limitation by AI type/industry group.
previous.title: CLICK AI - Develop AI in one click without any coding

localize.description: 无需聘请人工智能开发人员或专家，引进新技术，实现业务多元化。CLICK AI让任何人都可以快速、高精度地创建基于深度学习的AI模型，且不受AI类型/行业组的限制。
localize.tagline: 无需任何编码，一键开发AI

localize.description: 無需聘請人工智能開發人員或專家，引進新技術，實現業務多元化。CLICK AI讓任何人都可以快速、高精度地創建基於深度學習的AI模型，且不受AI類型/行業組的限制。
localize.tagline: 無需任何編碼，一鍵開發AI

next.excerpt: Saasland is a creative WordPress theme for saas, software, startup, mobile app, agency & services. SaasLand is loaded with tons of features, elements & blocks, options that give its users real flexibility to create a dynamic, professional website in no time.
next.title: Saasland - Multi-purpose WordPress theme for SaaS startups

localize.description: Saasland是一个创造性的WordPress主题为saas，软件，创业，移动应用程序，机构和服务。SaasLand加载了大量的功能，元素和块，选项，给用户真正的灵活性，以创建一个动态，专业的网站在任何时间。
localize.tagline: 多用途的WordPress主题为SaaS创业公司

localize.description: Saasland是一個創造性的WordPress主題爲saas，軟件，創業，移動應用程序，機構和服務。SaasLand加載了大量的功能，元素和塊，選項，給用戶真正的靈活性，以創建一個動態，專業的網站在任何時間。
localize.tagline: 多用途的WordPress主題爲SaaS創業公司
